SEARCH
Package gw.api.rest.validation

Interface IRestValidatorFactory

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
DateConstraintValidatorFactory, JsonLogicPropertyValidatorFactory, ResourcePropertyValidatorFactory, TypeKeyReferenceValidatorFactory
public interface IRestValidatorFactory extends InternalPlugin
This plugin represents a factory that is able to create custom validators for json schema properties, items, or object definitions, or for swagger parameters or parameter items. Multiple implementations of this plugin can be registered, in which case all registered plugins will be invoked for each schema property or definition. The factory pattern is used to allow the creation of the validator to do necessary setup work to ensure that the validators themselves execute as fast as possible at runtime, as well as to provide a way to report errors in the configuration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<? extends JsonPropertyValidator>
    createItemValidators(JsonSchemaItems items, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
    Creates custom item validators for this items declaration, if any.
    List<? extends SwaggerParameterValidator>
    createItemValidators(SwaggerOperation operation, SwaggerParameter parameter, SwaggerItems items, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
    Creates custom parameter validators for the given items definition, if any.
    List<? extends JsonObjectValidator>
    createObjectValidators(JsonSchemaDefinition definition, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
    Creates custom object validators for this schema definition, if any.
    List<? extends SwaggerParameterValidator>
    createParameterValidators(SwaggerOperation operation, SwaggerParameter parameter, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
    Creates custom parameter validators for the given parameter definition, if any.
    List<? extends JsonPropertyValidator>
    createPropertyValidators(JsonSchemaProperty property, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
    Creates custom property validators for this property, if any.

  • Method Details

    • createPropertyValidators

      List<? extends JsonPropertyValidator> createPropertyValidators(JsonSchemaProperty property, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
      Creates custom property validators for this property, if any. This method can return either null or an empty list if no custom validators are relevant.
      Parameters:
      property - the JsonSchemaProperty
      validationResult - used to report back configuration errors; for example, if a given custom validation should only be used with properties of a particular type, or if the value of a particular extension property is expected to be a particular type
      Returns:
      a list of custom JsonPropertyValidators that should be executed when deserializing this property

    • createItemValidators

      List<? extends JsonPropertyValidator> createItemValidators(JsonSchemaItems items, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
      Creates custom item validators for this items declaration, if any. This method can return either null or an empty list if no custom validators are relevant.
      Parameters:
      items - the JsonSchemaItems
      validationResult - used to report back configuration errors; for example, if a given custom validation should only be used with elements of a particular type, or if the value of a particular extension property is expected to be a particular type
      Returns:
      a list of custom JsonPropertyValidator that should be executed when deserializing these elements

    • createObjectValidators

      List<? extends JsonObjectValidator> createObjectValidators(JsonSchemaDefinition definition, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
      Creates custom object validators for this schema definition, if any. This method can return either null or an empty list if no custom validators are relevant.
      Parameters:
      definition - the JsonSchemaDefinition
      validationResult - used to report back configuration errors; for example, if the value of a particular extension property is expected to be a particular type
      Returns:
      a list of custom JsonObjectValidators that should be executed when deserializing this object

    • createParameterValidators

      List<? extends SwaggerParameterValidator> createParameterValidators(SwaggerOperation operation, SwaggerParameter parameter, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
      Creates custom parameter validators for the given parameter definition, if any. This method can return either null or an empty list if no custom validators are relevant.
      Parameters:
      operation - the SwaggerOperation that the parameter is part of
      parameter - the SwaggerParameter
      validationResult - used to report back configuration errors; for example, if the value of a particular extension property is expected to be a particular type
      Returns:
      a list of custom SwaggerParameterValidators that should be executed when deserializing this parameter

    • createItemValidators

      List<? extends SwaggerParameterValidator> createItemValidators(SwaggerOperation operation, SwaggerParameter parameter, SwaggerItems items, ValidatorFactoryValidationResult validationResult)
      Creates custom parameter validators for the given items definition, if any. This method can return either null or an empty list if no custom validators are relevant.
      Parameters:
      operation - the SwaggerOperation that the parameter is part of
      parameter - the SwaggerParameter
      items - the SwaggerItems
      validationResult - used to report back configuration errors; for example, if the value of a particular extension property is expected to be a particular type
      Returns:
      a list of custom SwaggerParameterValidators that should be executed when deserializing these elements
